verses.name: John 14:22
verses.text: Judas saith unto him, not Iscariot, Lord, how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us, and not unto the world?

verses.name: John 14:23
verses.text: Jesus answered and said unto him, If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.

verses.name: John 14:24
verses.text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings: and the word which ye hear is not mine, but the Father’s which sent me.

verses.name: John 14:25
verses.text: These things have I spoken unto you, being yet present with you.
